member.name: T:Penguin.Cms.Web.Security.AuthenticationToken
member.summary: A token intended to serve as a temporary login for API access, or password resets

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Web.Security.AuthenticationToken.User
member.summary: Guid representing the user this token is tied to

member.name: T:Penguin.Cms.Web.Security.EmailValidationToken
member.summary: Used to track whether or not a user has validated their email

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Web.Security.EmailValidationToken.IsValidated
member.summary: True if the user has validated this token by clicking the link in their email
